title: Gift of the Seekers
description: ISBN-10: 1501092804 -- This is an alternate cover edition.In this, the second book of the series, Turn of the Tides, magic-wielding pirate captain Loslin and his brother West follow the cryptic riddles in the magic scroll left by their father for them. They are sent to Acerima to find a mysterious man named Bobbyn and hone the skills they need in order to fulfill their role in the ongoing saga. The story is packed full of magic, brotherly love, battles with monsters and men, and some fun surprises along the way.This is clean YA Fantasy.
author: Christy  Newman
